actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution recognizing the community services of Archie Edwards Blues Heritage Foundation, designating the fortnight beginning November 29, 2002, as the "Blues Heritage Appreciation Fortnight", and designating Friday, November 29, 2002, as "Blues Friday".

summary.text: Recognizes the community services of the Archie Edwards Blues Heritage Foundation and the importance of blues music in the history of American culture.Designates: (1) the fortnight beginning November 29, 2002, as the Blues Heritage Appreciation Fortnight; and (2) Friday, November 29, 2002, as Blues Friday.

titles.title: A resolution recognizing the community services of Archie Edwards Blues Heritage Foundation, designating the fortnight beginning November 29, 2002, as the "Blues Heritage Appreciation Fortnight", and designating Friday, November 29, 2002, as "Blues Friday".
